title: cryptooloans23
author: cryptooloans23
content: Looking for a crypto loan?                Look no further!      Our business offers loans of up to    50 BTC with a maximum repayment  period of 7 years. The process is simple: 1. Submit your KYC documents, proof of residence and ID 2. A 1% commission fee is taken on the loan 3. Sign an agreement between both parties 4. Final loan transfer 5. Our interest rates range from 4% to 9% depending on the requested amount. We also offer loans on Ethereum, starting from 10 ETH to 200 ETH. The payments can be settled between both parties on a monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis, or even all at the end, depending on the amount requested. Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure the funds you need. Apply now and see the benefits of our quick and secure loan processFell free to message us on telegram at @cryptooloans

The process is simple: 1. Submit your KYC documents, proof of residence and ID 2. A 1% commission fee is taken on the loan 3. Sign an agreement between both parties 4. Final loan transfer 5. Our interest rates range from 4% to 9% depending on the requested amount. We also offer loans on Ethereum, starting from 10 ETH to 200 ETH. The payments can be settled between both parties on a monthly, quarterly, or yearly basis, or even all at the end, depending on the amount requested. Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure the funds you need. Apply now and see the benefits of our quick and secure loan processFell free to message us on telegram at @cryptooloans You again   .Last time nobody fell for it, this time nobody will.

comments.author: franckuestein
comments.body: As of today I still don't understand how they can believe that people will take them seriously if their first message is already offering a service. Grow up.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Sign a message with today's date and your bitcointalk name showing you have 50btc to loan if you want anyone to take you seriously. Otherwise, this just looks like a silly attempt to steal users kyc info.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: cryptooloans23 on January 28, 2023, 04:11:14 PM 5. Our interest rates range from 4% to 9% depending on the requested amount. You have not studied your competition. While in the forum we have many lenders who are giving loans for lesser interest, you are asking 4 to 9%. You have no track record nothing. This could be a collateral scam attempt too. You will ask for collateral and walk away with it.Quote from: yahoo62278 on January 28, 2023, 06:03:19 PMSign a message with today's date and your bitcointalk name showing you have 50btc to loan if you want anyone to take you seriously. Otherwise, this just looks like a silly attempt to steal users kyc info.Even with the 50 btc signed address I don't think I will be trusting them with a collateral.
